name: @'s Die
description:
@'s Die

See through the chances in combat in the form of dices.

How far into the dungeons can you go?


WASD to move.

Click on enemies to view information and their modifiers.

S stands for steps - how many moves it will make this turn.

Modifiers are special stats displayed above the usual information, and more information can be viewed by hovering on them.

Get to the glowing white exit.

7DRL POSTMORTEM
